>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

@Icon[type:graviton] Graviton Revelation

You can shape gravity into translucent coils that you can anchor to objects. As a standard action, you can hurl this coil at a target, functioning in all ways like a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.LfYPseAOCIBmSFlD]{Grappler} with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.oAkdDFxOksvO88bU]{titanium alloy cable line} with a maximum range equal to 30 feet multiplied by your Charisma modifier (minimum 1). This cable line lasts for 1 minute or until you use this revelation again. While you are attuned or fully attuned, you gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.iSfZFb5EN5xs5fKa]{Grappler Pull (Combat)} as a bonus feat.
